trans-unit.source: Declares permissions for loading types from assemblies that are used by a XAML reader or writer.
trans-unit.target: Declara as permissões para o carregamento de tipos de assemblies que são usados por um XAML leitor ou gravador.

trans-unit.source: XamlLoadPermission is relevant for scenarios such as whether internal types are permitted to load under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: XamlLoadPermission é relevante para cenários como se os tipos internos têm permissão para carregar em confiança parcial.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using an enumerable set of specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> de classe, usando um conjunto enumerável de específicos <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with each `allowedAccess` entry as an item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada para o construtor inicializa o <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>coleção com cada `allowedAccess` entrada como um item e define o retorno de <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>para `false` na instância criada.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um conjunto enumerável de específicos <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess is .
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessis .

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess contained invalid information, such as a null item.
trans-unit.target: allowedAccesscontinha informações inválidas, como um item nulo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using existing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> de classe, usando as permissões existentes.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `true` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>Define o retorno de <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>para `true` na instância criada.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Any call to this constructor sets the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection to `null` because it is not relevant if permissions are being reported rather than <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer chamada para esse construtor define o <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>coleção `null` porque ele não é relevante se as permissões estão sendo geradas em vez de <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using a single <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> de classe, usando uma única <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with `allowedAccess` as the only item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada para o construtor inicializa o <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>coleção com `allowedAccess` como o único item e define o retorno de <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>para `false` na instância criada.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: The defining <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A definição de <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess is .
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of all <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values that this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de todos os <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> valores que esse <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> representa.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is initialized such that <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is `true`, AllowedAccess may be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o atual <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>é inicializado, de modo que <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>é `true`, AllowedAccess pode ser `null`.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A read-only list of <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista somente leitura de <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> valores, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Consulte comentários.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria e retorna uma cópia idêntica do atual <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Per the interface contract of <xref:System.Security.IPermission> this value is <xref:System.Security.IPermission> in the signature but can be cast to <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.
trans-unit.target: Por que o contrato da interface de <xref:System.Security.IPermission>esse valor é <xref:System.Security.IPermission>na assinatura, mas pode ser convertido em <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> </xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia do atual <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Reconstrói um objeto de segurança com um estado especificado de uma codificação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: O XML de codificação a ser usada para reconstruir o objeto de segurança.

trans-unit.source: elem is .
trans-unit.target: elemis .

trans-unit.source: elem does not contain the XML encoding for a .
trans-unit.target: elemnão contém a codificação XML para um .

trans-unit.source: -or- The version attribute within elem is not supported.
trans-unit.target: o atributo version no - ou - elem não tem suporte.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> includes a specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> in its <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*> list.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se isso <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> inclui um especificado <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> no seu <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>lista.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>

trans-unit.source: The specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> to check for.
trans-unit.target: Específico <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> para verificar.

trans-unit.source: if requestedAccess exists as an item in the list of the current .
trans-unit.target: Se requestedAccess existe como um item de lista do atual .

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: requestedAccess is null.
trans-unit.target: requestedAccessé nulo.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> that is the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Cria e retorna um <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> que é a interseção do atual <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> e a permissão especificada.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Para union, intersect e a lógica de subconjunto <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>é verificada pela primeira vez e pode retornar um resultado baseado apenas nessa verificação.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>é verificada.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> to intersect with the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> a interseção com a atual <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova permissão que representa a interseção do atual <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> e especificado <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Essa nova permissão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a interseção está vazia.

trans-unit.source: target is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not or is not a .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o atual <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> é um subconjunto da permissão especificada.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Para union, intersect e a lógica de subconjunto <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>é verificada pela primeira vez e pode retornar um resultado baseado apenas nessa verificação.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>é verificada.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `target` is `null` and the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is both <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` and has an empty <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> list, this method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `target` é `null` e atual <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>é <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` e tem um vazio <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>lista, esse método retorna `true`.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: Uma permissão a ser testado para a relação de subconjunto.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o atual <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> é um subconjunto da permissão especificada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: target is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not or is not a .

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se isso <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> denota permissões irrestritas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> denota permissões irrestritas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> has specific access level restrictions in <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>, or has no permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Se este <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> tem restrições de nível de acesso específico em <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>, ou não tem permissões.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma codificação de XML deste <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> e seu estado atual.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: Uma codificação de XML deste <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>, incluindo quaisquer informações de estado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma permissão que é a união de atual <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> e a permissão especificada.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Para union, intersect e a lógica de subconjunto <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>é verificada pela primeira vez e pode retornar um resultado baseado apenas nessa verificação.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>é verificada.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `other` is `null`, the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se `other` é `null`, atual <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>é retornado.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> to combine with the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> para combinar com a atual <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> that represents the union of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> que representa a união de atual <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> e especificado <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: other is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: otheris not or is not a .
